HERO.headline: Hey, I’m Alexey Shagiakhmetov. A Front-End Developer & Team Lead
HERO.subline: I am a fullstack developer with an incredibly impressive experience working on various tasks who has a passion for building responsive, cool looking, and easy to visit website applications.

ABOUT.label: Let me introduce myself
ABOUT.title: Alexey Shagiakhmetov
ABOUT.introduce-1: My name is Alexey Shagiakhmetov, and I am a passionate Front-End Developer & Team Lead. I specialize in creating seamless and visually appealing user interfaces, combining design and development to enhance user experiences.
ABOUT.introduce-2: I love turning ideas into interactive and functional web applications. Excited to collaborate and build amazing digital products together!

SERVICE.label: service
SERVICE.headline: Custom frontend and backend solutions for your requirements.
SERVICE.subline: I specialize in creating user-centered solutions for businesses and individuals. Let’s create something extraordinary together.
SERVICE.service-desc-1: Web development refers to building, creating, and maintaining websites. It includes aspects such as web design, web publishing, web programming, and database management. It is the creation of an application that works over the internet, i.e., websites.
SERVICE.service-desc-2: Mobile application development is the process of making software for smartphones, tablets and digital assistants, most commonly for the Android and iOS operating systems.
SERVICE.service-desc-3: In digital design, user interface (UI) refers to the interactivity, look, and feel of a product screen or web page, while user experience (UX) covers a user’s overall experience with the product or website.

WORK.label: works
WORK.headline: Custom IT solutions for your requirements.
WORK.subline: I specialize in creating user-centered solutions for businesses and individuals. Let’s create something extraordinary together.

CTA.label: Let’s Build Something Great Together
CTA.description: Looking for a modern, seamless website or app interface? I`m here to bring your ideas to life.
